body.name: MERRYROYAL Tablet, 10.4 inch Tablet, Android 11 Tablet, 32GB, Quad Core, 6000mAh Battery, 1332x800 HD CTP Tablets (LightGray)
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 21 mins
features: 💭【High-performance Tablet】Equipped with 2GB RAM, 32GB ROM, the tablet is perfectly suited for everyday learning and entertainment use. Equipped micro SD card slot allows expansion up to 128GB providing ample storage space for your documents, media files and other data.
💭【Update Android 11 Go System】Runs the latest Android 11 GO with Google play store pre-installed and full access to all apps. Safer and faster than the previous Windows system.

💭【Slim Design】With its perfect curvature and ultra-narrow bezel slim design of only 8.9mm, the MERRYROYAL Android 11 tablet illustrates our pursuit of beauty and technology. Our ultra-thin and lightweight laptop is designed for portability.

💭【 Long Battery Life 】MERRYROYAL tablet with a massive 6000mAh battery for up to 5 hours, the 10.4-inch tablet is a truly great companion for your leisure and entertainment. It has long battery life and solid performance.
💭【 After-sales service 】Comes with a USB Type-C data cable. We're so confident in our Android tablets, that we offer ONE-year limited warranty.
body.description: MERRYROYAL TP1036 10.4" inch 32GB Android 11 Quad Core 6000mAh 1332x800 HD CTP Tablets The MERRYROYAL TP1036 10.4" tablet features a highly integrated A133 quad-core ARM CortexTM-A53@1.6GHz application processor designed for mainstream tablet applications. It equipped with the latest version of the GMS certified Android 11 operating system. 2 GB RAM, 32 GB ROM (128GB expandable), Quad-Core processor, Dual camera (2MP Front camera,5MP rear camera), Gravity acceleration sensor，Anti-Collision Covermaking, 802.11b/g/n+BT4.0 WiFi support, 6000MAh powerful battery, One year return and exchange service. Product: Brand: MERRYROYALColore: Gray/SliverSystem: Android 10.0Processor: 1.6GHzMemory: RAM: 2 GB ROM: 32GB ROMExtended Support: 4-128GB Micro SD CardSCREEN: Screen size: 10.4 inches Touchscreen material: G + GScreen Resolution: 1332x800 HD CTPCamera: Rear Camera: 5.0 MP Front camera: 2.0 MPWhat's in the box: - 1 x Tablet - 1 x User Manual - 1 x Type C Cablet - 1 x Charger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a happy grad student
reviews.reviewText: was kinda just hoping for the best and wasnt expecting too much since the price was so low, but it's beautiful. crisp visuals and audio. good weight so it doesn't feel flimsy. easy to set up (i have an android phone so it transferred my back up data/installed all my apps in maybe 15-20 minutes). and now i have a great sized screen to do school work on, read and watch videos. I was on it for about 4 hrs yesterday with no noticable drain in battery. an amazing value for the price point.*haven't tested the camera/video quality for chats/virtual meetings yet*for those who care, all audio comes out of one of the longer sides so it can feel odd listening to something when holding the tablet upright. if it's horizontal, it's not noticeable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: I received this really quickly from the seller. There were no defects. It's exactly as I expected it to be. Not a real fast tablet (as the specs and price would indicate)... For the price it was well worth it for what I'll use it for. I'm going to use it as a Bluetooth display with a fish finder so doesn't need to be really fast. All in all a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tablet has a bright screen and a decently size screen. Tablet is light yet sturdy. The volume is excellent, it's loud enough for traveling in the car. The tablet connects to wifi easily. It plays movies, general app play and internet browses well. The screen is very responsive to touch, there is little to no lag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs extremely slowly!
reviews.reviewText: This tablet takes such a long time to load apps! And then most of the time it will drop you out of the app for no apparent reason. Runs an old version of Android and doesn't seem to be a way to update it. Plus, only uses 2 gig wifi! Some videos or games run very jerkily. Based my purchase on someone else's good review, but obviously they didn't use it for much! It does have a nice screen, very vibrant. But, it only charges eith the provided charger although a have various other ones.If I knew the troubles this one had I would've spent just a little bit more and would've gotten a much better tablet! Was a waste for my purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's good for what you pay for..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got one similar from best buy and it lagged bad. This one is decent and easy to setup. The brightness is perfect and can be adjusted. Picture quality is normal, not blurry but not super high in expense. Overall I like it and use it for everyday things.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: This thing will not hold a charge. It’s super slow. It just sucks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This company really has over the top customer service. I had a small problem with my original tablet, and they replaced it immediately. No questions asked. I love the tablet and it works wonderfully. Susie was my customer service rep and is wonderful. Susie replied promptly and followed through immediately. My new tablet arrived in just a few days. It is a wonderful tablet and has beautiful clarity. I highly recommend it.
